name: Spaceballs and Blocks
description:
A game to bring back movie nostalgia. This is an homage to Mel Brooks Spaceballs and was created as my first real game I did while following a tutorial from GameDev TV on Udemy. 

- Use the mouse to move the Winnebago [Paddle]
- Press '=" during play to get an extra ball (Cheat)
- Press 'Esc" during play to move to the next level (Cheat)
- Press 'F12' to clear your HighScore

Barf Blocks - Give a Superball Power up, destroys any block that is hit.
Dark Helmet - On some levels has a Swarz Power that pushes the ball and lowers the damage done and the cause the ball to take 1/2 penalty to points.
Yogurt - Has Swartz powers but gives positive damage boost and positive point modifiers.
LoneStarr and Princess Vesper - gives an extra life.
